author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title say it all, possibly needed by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37619

#### PR validation:

Tested together with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37619 using `runTheMatrix.py --what gpu -l 11634.503` on `lxplus-gpu` successfully.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Add support of `TH1I` and `TH2I` in DQM
